input.sentences: the annual halloween party was held at the community center .
the elders decided to decorate with a scary theme in mind .
the kids were able to get their faces painted
and enjoyed themselves even when waiting in line .
the day ended with a bond fire .
output.sentences: We held this year's Halloween party at a fish restaurant.
As usual, the decor was a scary theme, but no one minded if the children n dressed in scary or fun costmens.
We hired a local artist to paint the kids faces.
The kids got a real bang out of that and did not even mind waiting in line.
After the restaurant trip, the kids set up camp and we had a bonfire, which was a thrilling way to end the day and bond over songs and smores.
